_header: For to crien to God for help in all our needs
_description: Advice for spiritual living — four monorhyming lines with internal rhyme in John Grimestone’s sermon notes on II Cor. 6.2

NLS18721.Transcription:
For to criȝen to god for helpe in al oure nedesFor to
                    aspiȝen þis werd oure fles þe deueles redesFor to tellen
                    oure scrif fader al oure misdedesAnd for to sellen bodily godes in elmes
                    dedes
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 62.
